name: Nancy's Beef Brisket Bar-B-Q
ingredients: 3 tablespoons granular Splenda or equivalent liquid

instructions.en: Combine 2 teaspoons paprika and 1 1/2 teaspoons salt, then rub this mixture all over both sides of the brisket.
Put the meat in a 9x13" baking pan lined with heavy duty foil.
Combine the remaining ingredients (ketchup, vinegar, onion, Worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke, molasses, Splenda, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and pepper) in a bowl.
Pour the sauce mixture over the meat.
Cover the baking pan tightly with foil.

notes: This recipe makes about 10 servings. The brisket can be frozen. Lining the baking pan with heavy duty foil helps with clean-up.
